author: PR.com
title: ILY Enterprise Inc. Introduces the New Open Platform Hard Disk Drive Duplicator - iOpen Series
text:
ILY Enterprise Inc. Introduces the New Open Platform Hard Disk Drive Duplicator - iOpen Series
ILY Enterprise Inc. introduces the new iOpen Series Hard Disk Drive (HDD) Duplicator featuring open platform design with high copy speed of 150 MB/s.
City of Industry, CA, August 14, 2015 --( PR.com )-- ILY Enterprise Inc. introduces the new iOpen Series Hard Disk Drive (HDD) Duplicator featuring open platform design with high copy speed of 150 MB/s. Comparing to other HDD duplicators with tower case, iOpen Series is ideal for duplication of various format of HDD and SSD. With a SSD converter, exchanging and duplicating SSD is much easier for iOpen Series to save time and achieve higher efficiency. The Copy Speed can go high up to 150 MB/s or 9 GB/minute, and will remain the same speed even if the number of load is increased.
iOpen Series HDD Duplicator features:
· Supports mSATA，slim SATA，Micro SATA and NGFF format of SSD interface
· Asynchronous copy mode for higher efficiency
· Supports all file system format and file size, and supports Fast Copy for Windows, Linux, Mac and other system format files allowing you to do more in less time
· Supports MBR and GPT partition format
· Supports 4K advanced format hard disk drive without capacity limitation
· Equipped with automatic power-off mechanism to protect the hard drive from damage
· Fan automatic control system will stop the fan from running when the finish of copy process is detected to keep noise low
Please visit our web site for more information.
About ILY Enterprise Inc.:
ILY Enterprise, Inc. is a pioneer in developing and manufacturing standalone duplicator systems, including Blu-ray/DVD/CD duplicator, USB/Flash Memory duplication system and portable duplication technologies since 1995.
ILY Enterprise, Inc. provides one-year warranty for all Spartan brand duplicator systems. All duplicators are proudly assembled and tested in City of Industry, California.
